Package org.radarbase.management.repository

Interface RoleRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Role,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Role,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Role,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Role>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Role,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.history.RevisionRepository<Role,​java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Integer>
    @RepositoryDefinition(domainClass=Role.class,
                      idClass=java.lang.Long.class)
public interface RoleRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Role,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.history.RevisionRepository<Role,​java.lang.Long,​java.lang.Integer>
